name: The 9th International Conference on Management, Economics and Finance
content: 9th International Conference on Management, Economics, and Finance (ICMEF) 2025 Dates: April 25-27, 2025 Location: Madrid, Spain Venue: Meliá Madrid Princesa, C. de la Princesa, 27, Moncloa – Aravaca, 28008 Madrid Conference Overview The 9th International Conference on Management, Economics, and Finance (ICMEF) 2025 is a premier event for academics, researchers, and professionals eager to explore the latest advancements in these fields. Hosted in the vibrant city of Madrid, this conference offers an enriching platform for sharing knowledge, networking with industry experts, and contributing to transformative discussions that shape the future of management, economics, and finance. Why Attend ICMEF 2025? Transformative Learning Experiences: Engage in seminars and sessions led by global thought leaders who are at the forefront of their fields. Learn about the latest trends and innovations that are driving change in management, economics, and finance. Showcase Your Research: Present your original research work to an international audience. Receive valuable feedback from peers and experts that can help enhance your academic profile and contribute to your professional growth. Publishing Opportunities: Take advantage of the opportunity to publish your research in prestigious indexed journals, including SCOPUS and Web of Science. This is your chance to increase the visibility and impact of your work. Network with Global Peers: Build meaningful connections with a diverse group of professionals, academics, and industry experts. The conference offers an ideal environment for networking and forming collaborations that can last beyond the event. Explore Madrid: Enjoy a complimentary guided tour of Madrid, a city known for its vibrant culture, historic architecture, and world-renowned attractions. This tour offers a perfect blend of cultural exploration and professional networking. Important Dates Abstract/Proposal Submission Deadline: April 4, 2025 Notification of Acceptance: Within 7 to 14 days of submission Early Bird Registration Deadline: October 29, 2024 Early Registration Deadline: January 29, 2025 Late Registration Deadline: April 15, 2025 Conference Dates: April 25-27, 2025 Why You Should Attend ICMEF 2025 is a must-attend event for anyone committed to advancing their knowledge and career in the fields of management, economics, and finance. This conference provides unparalleled opportunities for professional development, networking, and learning from the best in the industry. Whether you’re a student, researcher, or industry professional, attending ICMEF 2025 will allow you to gain valuable insights, explore cutting-edge research, and present your own work on an international stage. Participation Options Presenters: Share your research findings through oral or poster presentations. This is an excellent opportunity to receive feedback, engage with other experts, and contribute to global discussions. Listeners: Participate in sessions, engage with the latest research, and network with fellow attendees. Whether in-person or online, you’ll gain insights and make connections that can benefit your career. In-Person or Online: ICMEF 2025 offers the flexibility to attend either in person at the luxurious Meliá Madrid Princesa or online from wherever you are. Additional Information All participants are invited to join a free guided tour of Madrid, included with your conference registration. This tour is designed to provide a unique cultural experience, allowing you to explore the city’s most iconic landmarks while networking with other conference attendees in a relaxed setting. Register Today! Don’t miss out on the opportunity to be part of the 9th International Conference on Management, Economics, and Finance. Register now to secure your spot, whether you plan to attend in person or virtually. ICMEF 2025 is the perfect platform to elevate your career, expand your academic network, and experience the vibrant city of Madrid. We look forward to seeing you there!
